content.question: Compared to the position of anticolonial movements earlier in the twentieth century, the prospects for movements such as Ho Chi Minhâ€™s in the mid-twentieth century could most accurately be described as

choices.label: weaker because of the growth of Cold War tensions between communist and noncommunist countries
weaker because of improvements in military technology achieved by imperial powers
stronger because of the shift of industry to overseas colonial territories
stronger because the Second World War weakened imperialist powers

content.answer: stronger because the Second World War weakened imperialist powers

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
